mil7.4.3:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘tejassa panca angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani panca angani gahetabbani”ti?
mil7.4.3:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ye te abbhantara va bahira va kilesa itthanittharammananubhavana, sabbe te nanaggina dahitabba.
mil7.4.3:1.4: Idam, maharaja, tejassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.3:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, tejo niddayo akaruniko;
mil7.4.3:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sabbakilesesu karunnanuddaya na katabba.
mil7.4.3:2.3: Idam, maharaja, tejassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.3:3.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, tejo sitam patihanati;
mil7.4.3:3.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena viriyasantapatejam abhijanetva kilesa patihantabba.
mil7.4.3:3.3: Idam, maharaja, tejassa tatiyam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.3:4.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, tejo anunayappatighavippamutto unhamabhijaneti;
mil7.4.3:4.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena anunayappatighavippamuttena tejosamena cetasa viharitabbam.
mil7.4.3:4.3: Idam, maharaja, tejassa catuttham angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.3:5.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, tejo andhakaram vidhamitva alokam dassayati;
mil7.4.3:5.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena avijjandhakaram vidhamitva nanalokam dassayitabbam.
mil7.4.3:5.3: Idam, maharaja, tejassa pancamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.4.3:5.4: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena sakam puttam rahulam ovadantena—
mil7.4.3:6.2: Tejosamam hi te, rahula, bhavanam bhavayato uppanna manapamanapa phassa cittam na pariyadaya thassanti’”ti.
